knimeNode.name: HiLite Collector
knimeNode.shortDescription: Node allows to apply annotations to sets of hilit rows within a view.

fullDescription.intro: Node allows to apply annotations to sets of hilit rows within the view of the non-executed node. (1) Within the view, an annotation string can be entered which is then appended to all hilit rows. (2) During execution of this node, all annotations are appended as extra columns, 'Anno #X', to the end of the input table. (3) If the node is reset, all annotations are internally removed; also all annotations added while the node is executed, don't affect the output table.
fullDescription.option: Enter a new, non-empty annotation string which is then applied to the current set of hilit rows. All sub-sequent annotations to the same row, will be appended to the current string and separated by comma. If selected, a new column with the current annotation is appended to the table.

views.view: Applies annotations to the current set of hilit rows shown in this view, together with all rows to which annotation(s) have been applied.
